The campus is amazing. The staff has kept the campus clean and green. There are two huge libraries for the students to issue and learn.
There is a fitness club, cricket, volleyball, basketball, football, Kho-Kho, table tennis, badminton, etc.
There are other clubs run by students and faculty like the Green Army. The green army club takes students on nature walks and birding and does many green-related activities for the protection and preservation of flora and fauna.

Name: JITHIN THOMAS
Heading: Know about King College Of Technology
Review:
Every year the annual fest takes place in the month of march April , and also there where department functions of different branches.
Availability of books and journals in the library was fine, we can take the books for some days and return back, but if there were some delays, they take fines for that.
If we go to the sports, kho kho and cricket were the main, and apart from that football, handball and kabaddi were also there.
And small workshops were also held between.
There were no such groups or websites for students.

Name: Shantanu
Heading: IIIT Bhubaneswar
Review: I have taken Computer Engineering as my course. There is a student-to-faculty ratio of about 30:1. The faculty are average. While some are very good, a lot of them lack communication skills and teaching skills are not great either. The exams are conducted twice a year and the exams are of good enough quality. They are not very hard if you get the basics right.

Name: SATHIAH KUMAR
Heading: ASPIRE ATTAIN ACHIEVE
Review: I am very interested to study engineering so I took Mechanical engineering. The faculty members were highly qualified. They are very much talented in explaining a concept in an easy manner even though that was a difficult concept. The faculties here teach us new things beyond the syllabus that were very useful in our day-to-day modern engineering life. They put a lot of effort to be updated with current trends in engineering.
